Name: Bossa Nova #1
Ingredients: 60 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
22.5 ml De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare lime slice wheel for garnish.
Review: Apple with the added zing of rum, Galliano, apricot and lime juice.
History: Named after the Brazilian dance which in turn comes from the Portuguese bossa , meaning 'tendency', and nova ', meaning 'new'.
Nutrition: One serving of Bossa Nova #1 contains 279 calories
